snippet: From Lincoln Center to Battery Park, forró, the highly danceable Brazilian music style, is energizing young New Yorkers.
abstract: Popularity of the Brazilian dance music style known as forro has surged with the centennial of the birth of its biggest star Luiz Gonzaga; many venues around New York City host forro events and lessons.
lead_paragraph: From Lincoln Center to Battery Park, forró, the highly danceable Brazilian music style, is energizing young New Yorkers.

headline.seo: Forró Events at Lincoln Center and Brasil Summerfest
headline.main: A Two-Step Invasion of Brazilian Energy
headline.print_headline: A Two-Step Invasion of Brazilian Energy
